title: Trump Announces ‘Understanding’ with Mexico on Overhauling NAFTA
cleanedCompare: Seated Oval office, Trump joined Mexican president Enrique Peña Nieto phone announcing “incredible deal parties.” Trump Announces ‘Understanding’ Mexico Overhauling NAFTA | National Review

metadata.title: Donald Trump, Mexico Reach NAFTA 'Understanding' | National Review

feeds.title: National Review » Trump Announces ‘Understanding’ with Mexico on Overhauling NAFTA Comments Feed

metadata.description: President Trump announced Monday that his trade representatives have reached an “understanding” with Mexico that will likely lead to a complete renegotiation of the North American Free Trade Agreement.
metadata.sailthru.description: Seated in the Oval office, Trump was joined by Mexican president Enrique Peña Nieto over the phone in announcing an “incredible deal for both parties.”
